item.title: Someone to help create four scripts for a video production, each of which of 45 seconds long - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone who can create four video scripts, which are explainer videos to be used at a sales meeting to convey the capabilities of a product to a sales team. I need this project done today, which means in the next eight hours, and I would provide you a verbal articulation of, each of before capabilities along with what I have in mind for the video. I need someone who is skilled at craving the detail of the script that a videographer can take the script and create an elegant final product. Please reply only if you’re OK with the timeline and a $200 total job cost for all four scripts

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 22, 2024 14:37 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
